content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":264112,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それからお前と出会った、うーん、この男駄目かなぁと最初は思っていたさ","translatedEnglishLine":"And then I met you. Hmm, at first I thought this guy might be hopeless."},{"lineNumber":264113,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だが、お前はすごい奴だった、次々と魔人を倒した。","translatedEnglishLine":"But you were amazing, defeating demons one after another."},{"lineNumber":264114,"originalJapaneseLine":"　儂が魔剣になった意味を成就してくれた、本当にありがとう。","translatedEnglishLine":"You fulfilled the meaning of me becoming a demon sword. Truly, thank you."},{"lineNumber":264115,"originalJapaneseLine":"　明日も頼むぜ、相棒。一緒にこの世界から魔王、魔人を消し去ろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm counting on you tomorrow too, partner. Let's erase the demon king and demons from this world together."},{"lineNumber":264116,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いや、女の子は助けるぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, I'll save the girls."},{"lineNumber":264117,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あーん、せっかくいい盛り上げ方したのにー","translatedEnglishLine":"Aww, I went to all that effort to build it up nicely—"},{"lineNumber":264118,"originalJapaneseLine":"※上記はあくまでもネタです、何かランスとカオスでいい感じ作れたらなぁと","translatedEnglishLine":"*The above is just a joke; I was hoping to create a good vibe with Rance and Chaos somehow."},{"lineNumber":264119,"originalJapaneseLine":"海岸、夜","translatedEnglishLine":"Beach, night."},{"lineNumber":264120,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャンプが作られ、ささやかな宴会","translatedEnglishLine":"A camp was set up, a modest party underway."},{"lineNumber":264121,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラが現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera appeared."},{"lineNumber":264122,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとかそれとなくランスを連れ出し二人っきりになろうとするが","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow she tried to subtly take Rance away to be alone with him,"},{"lineNumber":264123,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが他の女の子とちゃらちゃらしたりして、うまくいかない","translatedEnglishLine":"but Rance was flirting with other girls, so it didn’t go well."},{"lineNumber":264124,"originalJapaneseLine":"キレル、ランスお前はサテラの物だ、その私が話があると言っているんだ、いいから来いとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Getting angry: Rance, you belong to Satera. I'm the one talking to you; just come along already."},{"lineNumber":264125,"originalJapaneseLine":"何怒っているんだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Why are you angry?"},{"lineNumber":264126,"originalJapaneseLine":"怒ってなんかいない","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm not angry."},{"lineNumber":264127,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのなんだ・・明日は魔人ケイブリスと戦う事になるかもしれない","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, um... tomorrow we might have to fight the demon Kaiburis."},{"lineNumber":264128,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前はサテラの使徒として、いや正式にはまだ使徒では無いが","translatedEnglishLine":"You are Satera's apostle, or rather, not officially an apostle yet,"},{"lineNumber":264129,"originalJapaneseLine":"　立派な戦っている、何人もの魔人を倒した、たいしたものだ","translatedEnglishLine":"But you've fought valiantly, defeated many demons. That's impressive."},{"lineNumber":264130,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だが、ケイブリスは別格だ。本当に恐ろしい奴だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, Kaiburis is a different class. Truly a terrifying foe."},{"lineNumber":264131,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私も全力で戦う、私とお前が力を合わせたら勝てるはずだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I will fight with all my strength. If we combine our powers, we should win."},{"lineNumber":264132,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・・えっと、明日、がんばろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"...Well, let's do our best tomorrow."},{"lineNumber":264133,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そ、それだけだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"T-That's all."},{"lineNumber":264134,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※なんか、一所懸命、ランスを励ますというか、明日一緒にがんばろうという","translatedEnglishLine":"*Kind of like trying hard to encourage Rance, or saying let's do our best together tomorrow."},{"lineNumber":264135,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※決意表明みたいなのを二人でしたかったサテラ、でも照れ屋というツンデレなので・・","translatedEnglishLine":"*Satera wanted to make a declaration of resolve with him, but being a shy tsundere..."},{"lineNumber":264136,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだ、私が褒めてやっているのにもっと喜べ、もういい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, I'm praising you, so be happier about it. That's enough."},{"lineNumber":264137,"originalJapaneseLine":"　明日、寝ぼけでこられたら困るから、さっさと寝ろ","translatedEnglishLine":"If you come half-asleep tomorrow, it'll be a problem, so go to bed quickly."},{"lineNumber":264138,"originalJapaneseLine":"褒めてくれたのか、うれしいぞ、明日はお前の為に絶対ケイブリスを倒してやる","translatedEnglishLine":"You praised me? I'm happy. Tomorrow, I'll definitely defeat Kaiburis for your sake."},{"lineNumber":264139,"originalJapaneseLine":"お、おう（うれしい・・真っ赤）","translatedEnglishLine":"O-Okay (I'm happy... blushing red)."},{"lineNumber":264140,"originalJapaneseLine":"だから、その前に俺に御褒美をくれ・・明日、がんばれるように御褒美だ","translatedEnglishLine":"So, before that, give me a reward... A reward so I can do my best tomorrow."},{"lineNumber":264141,"originalJapaneseLine":"てな感じでセックスに持ち込む","translatedEnglishLine":"And just like that, it leads to sex."},{"lineNumber":264142,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラもランスにせまられるのは嫌では無いし、むしろ待ち望んでいた事だが","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera doesn't dislike Rance approaching her; in fact, she had been looking forward to it."},{"lineNumber":264143,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（ランス１０になってから、まだ一度も抱かれた事が無かったというノリがいいかな）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Maybe it’s fitting that since Rance 10 started, she hasn’t been embraced even once.)"},{"lineNumber":264144,"originalJapaneseLine":"プライドが許さないので抵抗、文句を言うが・・すぐに押し倒される","translatedEnglishLine":"Her pride won’t allow it, so she resists and complains... but is quickly pushed down."},{"lineNumber":264145,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーザーが現れるが、シーザーむこうにいってろと命令してしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"Caesar appears, but she orders him to stay away."},{"lineNumber":264146,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラとのセックスシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"Sex scene with Satera."},{"lineNumber":264147,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラはすぐに感じる、あんあん","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera quickly feels it, ahn ahn."},{"lineNumber":264148,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いいか、使徒になるお前にだけこういう姿を見せるのだ、特別だぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Listen, I only show this side to you, who will become my apostle. You're special."},{"lineNumber":264149,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前を喜ばせる為にサービスしてやって・・　あひひゃ","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm serving you to make you happy... ahihi."},{"lineNumber":264150,"originalJapaneseLine":"　他の女とセックスしているが、サテラの使徒に正式なったらもうそんな事は必要無い","translatedEnglishLine":"You may have sex with other women now, but once you officially become Satera's apostle, that won’t be necessary anymore."},{"lineNumber":264151,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前の性欲はサテラが全て受け止めてやる、主として当然の義務だ","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera will accept all your desires—that's a natural duty as your master."},{"lineNumber":264152,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だから、他とするのは禁止だぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Therefore, sex with others is forbidden."},{"lineNumber":264153,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（・・・絶対、使徒にならないと誓うランスであった）","translatedEnglishLine":"(...And so Rance vowed never to become an apostle.)"},{"lineNumber":264154,"originalJapaneseLine":"海岸、夜","translatedEnglishLine":"Beach, night."},{"lineNumber":264155,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャンプが作られ、ささやかな宴会","translatedEnglishLine":"A camp was set up, a modest party underway."},{"lineNumber":264156,"originalJapaneseLine":"アギレダが現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Agireda appeared."},{"lineNumber":264157,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスと目配せ、ランスも分かっている","translatedEnglishLine":"Exchanging glances with Rance, and Rance understands too."},{"lineNumber":264158,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人で宴会から離れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The two left the party together."},{"lineNumber":264159,"originalJapaneseLine":"セックスしたくなったのだな","translatedEnglishLine":"You felt like having sex, huh."},{"lineNumber":264160,"originalJapaneseLine":"違う、これだ、と緑のビン","translatedEnglishLine":"No, it’s this—pointing at a green bottle."},{"lineNumber":264161,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう一度アギレダの目的を説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Once again, the purpose of Agireda is explained."},{"lineNumber":264162,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物界の崖、ここがＪＡＰＡＮから見てもっとも遠い世界の果てだ","translatedEnglishLine":"The cliff in the demon world; from Japan’s perspective, this is the farthest edge of the world."},{"lineNumber":264163,"originalJapaneseLine":"捨てよう、捨てたら全てが収まるはずだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s discard it. Once discarded, everything should settle."},{"lineNumber":264164,"originalJapaneseLine":"捨てる","translatedEnglishLine":"Discard it."},{"lineNumber":264165,"originalJapaneseLine":"私は任務を達成した、ちょっといいシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"I have completed the mission— a somewhat nice scene."},{"lineNumber":264166,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":264167,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後、二人は手を繋いで崖から立ち去ろうとすると、天から瓶が落ちてくる","translatedEnglishLine":"Afterward, as the two held hands and tried to leave the cliff, a bottle fell from the sky."},{"lineNumber":264168,"originalJapaneseLine":"瓶には手紙が入っていた、だが・・それはアギレダには読めない、ランスが読んでやる","translatedEnglishLine":"The bottle contained a letter, but Agireda couldn’t read it; Rance read it aloud."},{"lineNumber":264169,"originalJapaneseLine":"　または現れたクルックーなどが","translatedEnglishLine":"Or perhaps Kruukuu and others suddenly appeared."},{"lineNumber":264170,"originalJapaneseLine":"手紙には、アマゾン族の試練達成した、祝いの言葉　アマゾンパワーアップ　を叫べ","translatedEnglishLine":"The letter said they had completed the Amazon tribe's trial; shout words of celebration: Amazon power-up!"},{"lineNumber":264171,"originalJapaneseLine":"アギレダが叫ぶとアマテラスが現れ","translatedEnglishLine":"When Agireda shouted, Amaterasu appeared."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それからお前と出会った、うーん、この男駄目かなぁと最初は思っていたさ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then I met you. Hmm, at first I thought this guy might be hopeless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、お前はすごい奴だった、次々と魔人を倒した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But you were amazing, defeating demons one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂が魔剣になった意味を成就してくれた、本当にありがとう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You fulfilled the meaning of me becoming a demon sword. Truly, thank you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日も頼むぜ、相棒。一緒にこの世界から魔王、魔人を消し去ろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm counting on you tomorrow too, partner. Let's erase the demon king and demons from this world together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、女の子は助けるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I'll save the girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あーん、せっかくいい盛り上げ方したのにー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aww, I went to all that effort to build it up nicely—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※上記はあくまでもネタです、何かランスとカオスでいい感じ作れたらなぁと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *The above is just a joke; I was hoping to create a good vibe with Rance and Chaos somehow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海岸、夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Beach, night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャンプが作られ、ささやかな宴会
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A camp was set up, a modest party underway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとかそれとなくランスを連れ出し二人っきりになろうとするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow she tried to subtly take Rance away to be alone with him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが他の女の子とちゃらちゃらしたりして、うまくいかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Rance was flirting with other girls, so it didn’t go well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キレル、ランスお前はサテラの物だ、その私が話があると言っているんだ、いいから来いとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Getting angry: Rance, you belong to Satera. I'm the one talking to you; just come along already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何怒っているんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why are you angry?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒ってなんかいない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not angry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのなんだ・・明日は魔人ケイブリスと戦う事になるかもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, um... tomorrow we might have to fight the demon Kaiburis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前はサテラの使徒として、いや正式にはまだ使徒では無いが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are Satera's apostle, or rather, not officially an apostle yet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立派な戦っている、何人もの魔人を倒した、たいしたものだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But you've fought valiantly, defeated many demons. That's impressive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ケイブリスは別格だ。本当に恐ろしい奴だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Kaiburis is a different class. Truly a terrifying foe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も全力で戦う、私とお前が力を合わせたら勝てるはずだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will fight with all my strength. If we combine our powers, we should win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・えっと、明日、がんばろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Well, let's do our best tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、それだけだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: T-That's all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※なんか、一所懸命、ランスを励ますというか、明日一緒にがんばろうという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Kind of like trying hard to encourage Rance, or saying let's do our best together tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※決意表明みたいなのを二人でしたかったサテラ、でも照れ屋というツンデレなので・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Satera wanted to make a declaration of resolve with him, but being a shy tsundere...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、私が褒めてやっているのにもっと喜べ、もういい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I'm praising you, so be happier about it. That's enough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日、寝ぼけでこられたら困るから、さっさと寝ろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you come half-asleep tomorrow, it'll be a problem, so go to bed quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 褒めてくれたのか、うれしいぞ、明日はお前の為に絶対ケイブリスを倒してやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You praised me? I'm happy. Tomorrow, I'll definitely defeat Kaiburis for your sake.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お、おう（うれしい・・真っ赤）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: O-Okay (I'm happy... blushing red).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、その前に俺に御褒美をくれ・・明日、がんばれるように御褒美だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, before that, give me a reward... A reward so I can do my best tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな感じでセックスに持ち込む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And just like that, it leads to sex.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラもランスにせまられるのは嫌では無いし、むしろ待ち望んでいた事だが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera doesn't dislike Rance approaching her; in fact, she had been looking forward to it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランス１０になってから、まだ一度も抱かれた事が無かったというノリがいいかな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Maybe it’s fitting that since Rance 10 started, she hasn’t been embraced even once.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プライドが許さないので抵抗、文句を言うが・・すぐに押し倒される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her pride won’t allow it, so she resists and complains... but is quickly pushed down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーザーが現れるが、シーザーむこうにいってろと命令してしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caesar appears, but she orders him to stay away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラとのセックスシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sex scene with Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラはすぐに感じる、あんあん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera quickly feels it, ahn ahn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいか、使徒になるお前にだけこういう姿を見せるのだ、特別だぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listen, I only show this side to you, who will become my apostle. You're special.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前を喜ばせる為にサービスしてやって・・　あひひゃ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm serving you to make you happy... ahihi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の女とセックスしているが、サテラの使徒に正式なったらもうそんな事は必要無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You may have sex with other women now, but once you officially become Satera's apostle, that won’t be necessary anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の性欲はサテラが全て受け止めてやる、主として当然の義務だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera will accept all your desires—that's a natural duty as your master.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、他とするのは禁止だぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, sex with others is forbidden.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （・・・絶対、使徒にならないと誓うランスであった）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...And so Rance vowed never to become an apostle.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海岸、夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Beach, night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャンプが作られ、ささやかな宴会
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A camp was set up, a modest party underway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アギレダが現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Agireda appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと目配せ、ランスも分かっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Exchanging glances with Rance, and Rance understands too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人で宴会から離れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two left the party together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セックスしたくなったのだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You felt like having sex, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 違う、これだ、と緑のビン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it’s this—pointing at a green bottle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう一度アギレダの目的を説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once again, the purpose of Agireda is explained.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界の崖、ここがＪＡＰＡＮから見てもっとも遠い世界の果てだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The cliff in the demon world; from Japan’s perspective, this is the farthest edge of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捨てよう、捨てたら全てが収まるはずだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s discard it. Once discarded, everything should settle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捨てる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Discard it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は任務を達成した、ちょっといいシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have completed the mission— a somewhat nice scene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、二人は手を繋いで崖から立ち去ろうとすると、天から瓶が落ちてくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterward, as the two held hands and tried to leave the cliff, a bottle fell from the sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 瓶には手紙が入っていた、だが・・それはアギレダには読めない、ランスが読んでやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The bottle contained a letter, but Agireda couldn’t read it; Rance read it aloud.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: または現れたクルックーなどが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or perhaps Kruukuu and others suddenly appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手紙には、アマゾン族の試練達成した、祝いの言葉　アマゾンパワーアップ　を叫べ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The letter said they had completed the Amazon tribe's trial; shout words of celebration: Amazon power-up!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アギレダが叫ぶとアマテラスが現れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Agireda shouted, Amaterasu appeared.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

If we combine our powers, we should win."},{"lineNumber":264132,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・・えっと、明日、がんばろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"...Well, let's do our best tomorrow."},{"lineNumber":264133,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そ、それだけだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"T-That's all."},{"lineNumber":264134,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※なんか、一所懸命、ランスを励ますというか、明日一緒にがんばろうという","translatedEnglishLine":"*Kind of like trying hard to encourage Rance, or saying let's do our best together tomorrow."},{"lineNumber":264135,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※決意表明みたいなのを二人でしたかったサテラ、でも照れ屋というツンデレなので・・","translatedEnglishLine":"*Satera wanted to make a declaration of resolve with him, but being a shy tsundere..."},{"lineNumber":264136,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだ、私が褒めてやっているのにもっと喜べ、もういい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, I'm praising you, so be happier about it. That's enough."},{"lineNumber":264137,"originalJapaneseLine":"　明日、寝ぼけでこられたら困るから、さっさと寝ろ","translatedEnglishLine":"If you come half-asleep tomorrow, it'll be a problem, so go to bed quickly."},{"lineNumber":264138,"originalJapaneseLine":"褒めてくれたのか、うれしいぞ、明日はお前の為に絶対ケイブリスを倒してやる","translatedEnglishLine":"You praised me? A reward so I can do my best tomorrow."},{"lineNumber":264141,"originalJapaneseLine":"てな感じでセックスに持ち込む","translatedEnglishLine":"And just like that, it leads to sex."},{"lineNumber":264142,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラもランスにせまられるのは嫌では無いし、むしろ待ち望んでいた事だが","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera doesn't dislike Rance approaching her; in fact, she had been looking forward to it."},{"lineNumber":264143,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（ランス１０になってから、まだ一度も抱かれた事が無かったというノリがいいかな）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Maybe it’s fitting that since Rance 10 started, she hasn’t been embraced even once.)"},{"lineNumber":264144,"originalJapaneseLine":"プライドが許さないので抵抗、文句を言うが・・すぐに押し倒される","translatedEnglishLine":"Her pride won’t allow it, so she resists and complains... but is quickly pushed down."},{"lineNumber":264145,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーザーが現れるが、シーザーむこうにいってろと命令してしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"Caesar appears, but she orders him to stay away."},{"lineNumber":264146,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラとのセックスシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"Sex scene with Satera."},{"lineNumber":264147,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラはすぐに感じる、あんあん","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera quickly feels it, ahn ahn."},{"lineNumber":264148,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いいか、使徒になるお前にだけこういう姿を見せるのだ、特別だぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Listen, I only show this side to you, who will become my apostle. You're special."},{"lineNumber":264149,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前を喜ばせる為にサービスしてやって・・　あひひゃ","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm serving you to make you happy... ahihi."},{"lineNumber":264150,"originalJapaneseLine":"　他の女とセックスしているが、サテラの使徒に正式なったらもうそんな事は必要無い","translatedEnglishLine":"You may have sex with other women now, but once you officially become Satera's apostle, that won’t be necessary anymore."},{"lineNumber":264151,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前の性欲はサテラが全て受け止めてやる、主として当然の義務だ","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera will accept all your desires—that's a natural duty as your master."},{"lineNumber":264152,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だから、他とするのは禁止だぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Therefore, sex with others is forbidden."},{"lineNumber":264153,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（・・・絶対、使徒にならないと誓うランスであった）","translatedEnglishLine":"(...And so Rance vowed never to become an apostle.)"},{"lineNumber":264154,"originalJapaneseLine":"海岸、夜","translatedEnglishLine":"Beach, night."},{"lineNumber":264155,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャンプが作られ、ささやかな宴会","translatedEnglishLine":"A camp was set up, a modest party underway."},{"lineNumber":264156,"originalJapaneseLine":"アギレダが現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Agireda appeared."},{"lineNumber":264157,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスと目配せ、ランスも分かっている","translatedEnglishLine":"Exchanging glances with Rance, and Rance understands too."},{"lineNumber":264158,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人で宴会から離れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The two left the party together."},{"lineNumber":264159,"originalJapaneseLine":"セックスしたくなったのだな","translatedEnglishLine":"You felt like having sex, huh."},{"lineNumber":264160,"originalJapaneseLine":"違う、これだ、と緑のビン","translatedEnglishLine":"No, it’s this—pointing at a green bottle."},{"lineNumber":264161,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう一度アギレダの目的を説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Once again, the purpose of Agireda is explained."},{"lineNumber":264162,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物界の崖、ここがＪＡＰＡＮから見てもっとも遠い世界の果てだ","translatedEnglishLine":"The cliff in the demon world; Once discarded, everything should settle."},{"lineNumber":264164,"originalJapaneseLine":"捨てる","translatedEnglishLine":"Discard it."},{"lineNumber":264165,"originalJapaneseLine":"私は任務を達成した、ちょっといいシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"I have completed the mission— a somewhat nice scene."},{"lineNumber":264166,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":264167,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後、二人は手を繋いで崖から立ち去ろうとすると、天から瓶が落ちてくる","translatedEnglishLine":"Afterward, as the two held hands and tried to leave the cliff, a bottle fell from the sky."},{"lineNumber":264168,"originalJapaneseLine":"瓶には手紙が入っていた、だが・・それはアギレダには読めない、ランスが読んでやる","translatedEnglishLine":"The bottle contained a letter, but Agireda couldn’t read it; Rance read it aloud."},{"lineNumber":264169,"originalJapaneseLine":"　または現れたクルックーなどが","translatedEnglishLine":"Or perhaps Kruukuu and others suddenly appeared."},{"lineNumber":264170,"originalJapaneseLine":"手紙には、アマゾン族の試練達成した、祝いの言葉　アマゾンパワーアップ　を叫べ","translatedEnglishLine":"The letter said they had completed the Amazon tribe's trial; shout words of celebration: Amazon power-up!"},{"lineNumber":264171,"originalJapaneseLine":"アギレダが叫ぶとアマテラスが現れ","translatedEnglishLine":"When Agireda shouted, Amaterasu appeared."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それからお前と出会った、うーん、この男駄目かなぁと最初は思っていたさ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then I met you. Hmm, at first I thought this guy might be hopeless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、お前はすごい奴だった、次々と魔人を倒した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But you were amazing, defeating demons one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂が魔剣になった意味を成就してくれた、本当にありがとう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You fulfilled the meaning of me becoming a demon sword. Truly, thank you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日も頼むぜ、相棒。一緒にこの世界から魔王、魔人を消し去ろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm counting on you tomorrow too, partner. Let's erase the demon king and demons from this world together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、女の子は助けるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I'll save the girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あーん、せっかくいい盛り上げ方したのにー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aww, I went to all that effort to build it up nicely—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※上記はあくまでもネタです、何かランスとカオスでいい感じ作れたらなぁと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *The above is just a joke; I was hoping to create a good vibe with Rance and Chaos somehow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海岸、夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Beach, night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャンプが作られ、ささやかな宴会
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A camp was set up, a modest party underway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとかそれとなくランスを連れ出し二人っきりになろうとするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow she tried to subtly take Rance away to be alone with him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが他の女の子とちゃらちゃらしたりして、うまくいかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Rance was flirting with other girls, so it didn’t go well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キレル、ランスお前はサテラの物だ、その私が話があると言っているんだ、いいから来いとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Getting angry: Rance, you belong to Satera. I'm the one talking to you; just come along already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何怒っているんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why are you angry?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒ってなんかいない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not angry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのなんだ・・明日は魔人ケイブリスと戦う事になるかもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, um... tomorrow we might have to fight the demon Kaiburis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前はサテラの使徒として、いや正式にはまだ使徒では無いが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are Satera's apostle, or rather, not officially an apostle yet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立派な戦っている、何人もの魔人を倒した、たいしたものだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But you've fought valiantly, defeated many demons. That's impressive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ケイブリスは別格だ。本当に恐ろしい奴だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Kaiburis is a different class. Truly a terrifying foe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も全力で戦う、私とお前が力を合わせたら勝てるはずだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will fight with all my strength. If we combine our powers, we should win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・えっと、明日、がんばろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Well, let's do our best tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、それだけだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: T-That's all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※なんか、一所懸命、ランスを励ますというか、明日一緒にがんばろうという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Kind of like trying hard to encourage Rance, or saying let's do our best together tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※決意表明みたいなのを二人でしたかったサテラ、でも照れ屋というツンデレなので・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Satera wanted to make a declaration of resolve with him, but being a shy tsundere...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、私が褒めてやっているのにもっと喜べ、もういい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I'm praising you, so be happier about it. That's enough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日、寝ぼけでこられたら困るから、さっさと寝ろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you come half-asleep tomorrow, it'll be a problem, so go to bed quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 褒めてくれたのか、うれしいぞ、明日はお前の為に絶対ケイブリスを倒してやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You praised me? I'm happy. Tomorrow, I'll definitely defeat Kaiburis for your sake.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お、おう（うれしい・・真っ赤）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: O-Okay (I'm happy... blushing red).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、その前に俺に御褒美をくれ・・明日、がんばれるように御褒美だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, before that, give me a reward... A reward so I can do my best tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな感じでセックスに持ち込む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And just like that, it leads to sex.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラもランスにせまられるのは嫌では無いし、むしろ待ち望んでいた事だが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera doesn't dislike Rance approaching her; in fact, she had been looking forward to it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランス１０になってから、まだ一度も抱かれた事が無かったというノリがいいかな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Maybe it’s fitting that since Rance 10 started, she hasn’t been embraced even once.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プライドが許さないので抵抗、文句を言うが・・すぐに押し倒される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her pride won’t allow it, so she resists and complains... but is quickly pushed down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーザーが現れるが、シーザーむこうにいってろと命令してしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caesar appears, but she orders him to stay away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラとのセックスシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sex scene with Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラはすぐに感じる、あんあん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera quickly feels it, ahn ahn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいか、使徒になるお前にだけこういう姿を見せるのだ、特別だぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listen, I only show this side to you, who will become my apostle. You're special.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前を喜ばせる為にサービスしてやって・・　あひひゃ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm serving you to make you happy... ahihi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の女とセックスしているが、サテラの使徒に正式なったらもうそんな事は必要無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You may have sex with other women now, but once you officially become Satera's apostle, that won’t be necessary anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の性欲はサテラが全て受け止めてやる、主として当然の義務だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera will accept all your desires—that's a natural duty as your master.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、他とするのは禁止だぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, sex with others is forbidden.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （・・・絶対、使徒にならないと誓うランスであった）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...And so Rance vowed never to become an apostle.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海岸、夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Beach, night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャンプが作られ、ささやかな宴会
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A camp was set up, a modest party underway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アギレダが現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Agireda appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと目配せ、ランスも分かっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Exchanging glances with Rance, and Rance understands too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人で宴会から離れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two left the party together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セックスしたくなったのだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You felt like having sex, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 違う、これだ、と緑のビン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it’s this—pointing at a green bottle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう一度アギレダの目的を説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once again, the purpose of Agireda is explained.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界の崖、ここがＪＡＰＡＮから見てもっとも遠い世界の果てだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The cliff in the demon world; from Japan’s perspective, this is the farthest edge of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捨てよう、捨てたら全てが収まるはずだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s discard it. Once discarded, everything should settle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捨てる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Discard it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は任務を達成した、ちょっといいシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have completed the mission— a somewhat nice scene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、二人は手を繋いで崖から立ち去ろうとすると、天から瓶が落ちてくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterward, as the two held hands and tried to leave the cliff, a bottle fell from the sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 瓶には手紙が入っていた、だが・・それはアギレダには読めない、ランスが読んでやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The bottle contained a letter, but Agireda couldn’t read it; Rance read it aloud.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: または現れたクルックーなどが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or perhaps Kruukuu and others suddenly appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手紙には、アマゾン族の試練達成した、祝いの言葉　アマゾンパワーアップ　を叫べ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The letter said they had completed the Amazon tribe's trial; shout words of celebration: Amazon power-up!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アギレダが叫ぶとアマテラスが現れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Agireda shouted, Amaterasu appeared.
